Module Assignment
Package views

Class StaffView

java.lang.Object
views.StaffView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMenuView, IUserMenuView
public class StaffView extends Object implements IUserMenuView
StaffView class implements the IUserMenuView interface and is responsible for displaying the staff menu with various options. It includes options for creating, deleting, and editing camps, managing camp visibility, viewing reports, and more. Users can choose an option by entering the corresponding option number.

    Displays the filter options for report generation, choosing between between different filtering options such as No Filter, Camp Information, Attendee, Camp Committee, Location, and Date of Camp.

  • Constructor Details

    • StaffView

      public StaffView()

  • Method Details

    • displayMenuView

      public void displayMenuView()
      Displays the staff menu with various options. Options include creating, deleting, and editing camps, managing camp visibility, viewing reports, and more. The menu allows user to choose an option by entering the option number.
      Specified by:
      displayMenuView in interface IMenuView

    • editCampView

      public void editCampView()
      Displays the menu view for editing a camp's details. Users are prompted to select an option for the corresponding field to update. The fields to edit are camp name, start date, end date, registration closing date, location, total slots, committee slots, description and user group.

    • viewStudentList

      public void viewStudentList(List<String> students, List<String> committeeMembers, Camp c)
      Displays the list of students and committee members registered in a camp. If no students or committee members are registered, It returns appropriate messages like "No Students Registered". The list is sorted alphabetically, and each entry is numbered.
      Parameters:
      students - List of students registered in the camp.
      committeeMembers - List of committee members registered in the camp.
      c - The camp for which the student list is displayed.

    • viewCamps

      public void viewCamps(List<Camp> campData, String title)
      Displays the list of camps provided with a specified title. The list includes the camp names sorted alphabetically. Each camp is numbered in the menu for easy reference.
      Specified by:
      viewCamps in interface IUserMenuView
      Parameters:
      campData - The list of camps to be displayed.
      title - The customizable title to be centered at the top of the menu.

    • viewCampInformation

      public void viewCampInformation(Camp c)
      Displays detailed information about a specific camp, including its name, start and end dates, registration closing date, user group, location, total slots, committee slots, description, staff in charge, and visibility status.
      Specified by:
      viewCampInformation in interface IUserMenuView
      Parameters:
      c - The camp's information to be displayed.

    • viewFliterOption

      public void viewFliterOption()
      Displays the filter options menu for camps, including options to filter by date, filter by location, and sort by name in alphabetical order.
      Specified by:
      viewFliterOption in interface IUserMenuView

    • viewToggleOption

      public void viewToggleOption(Camp camp)
      Displays the toggle options menu for setting camp visibility, allowing the user to choose between "On" and "Off" visibility states for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp for which visibility options are displayed.

    • displayEnquiries

      public void displayEnquiries(Map<Integer,Enquiry> enquiries)
      Displays a formatted view of the enquiries, including details such as camp name, message, status, response, and responder ID for each enquiry. If there are no enquiries, a corresponding message "No Enquiries to Display" is displayed.
      Specified by:
      displayEnquiries in interface IUserMenuView
      Parameters:
      enquiries - A map of enquiries where the key is the enquiry ID and the value is the Enquiry object.

    • displaySuggestion

      public void displaySuggestion(Map<Integer,Suggestion> suggestions)
      Displays a formatted view of the suggestions, including details such as suggestion ID, camp name, message, and status for each suggestion. If there are no suggestions, a corresponding message "No Suggestions to Display" is displayed.
      Parameters:
      suggestions - A map of suggestions where the key is the suggestion ID and the value is the Suggestion object.

    • viewReportMenu

      public void viewReportMenu()
      Displays the menu for generating various types of reports, such as reports for all camps, the current staff user's camps, or a selected camp.

    • showFilterInput

      public void showFilterInput()
      Displays the filter options for report generation, choosing between between different filtering options such as No Filter, Camp Information, Attendee, Camp Committee, Location, and Date of Camp.

    • viewPerformanceReportMenu

      public void viewPerformanceReportMenu()
      Displays the menu for generating performance reports, providing options for generating reports for all camps, staff camps, or a selected camp.

    • showPerformanceFilterInput

      public void showPerformanceFilterInput()
      Displays the filter options for generating performance reports, allowing the user to choose between different filtering options such as Committee ID, Committee Name, and Committee Points.

    • viewEnquiryReportMenu

      public void viewEnquiryReportMenu()
      Displays the menu for generating enquiry reports, providing options for generating reports for all camps, staff camps, or a selected camp.

    • showEnquiryFilterInput

      public void showEnquiryFilterInput()
      Displays the filter options for generating enquiry reports, allowing the user to choose between different filtering options such as Enquiry ID, Sender Name, Responder Point, Enquiry Status, Enquiry Message, and Enquiry Response.
